name: powcaptcha
description: Proof of Work Captcha/Challenge/Brute Force protection for your browser and server, without any required user interaction.

scripts.minify: jsmin -o js/powcaptcha-server-module.min.js js/powcaptcha-server-module.js && jsmin -o js/powcaptcha-server.min.js js/powcaptcha-server.js && jsmin -o js/powcaptcha-browser.min.js js/powcaptcha-browser.js
scripts.dist: node ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --project tsconfig.json && node build/dist.js && npm run minify

author: BrainFooLong (Roland Eigelsreiter)
